item.description:
Something different!
Bushnell Park ist schon. Es sind schone Jazz Konzerte die kostenlos sind. Wir werden ein Picknick geniesen und horenzu Jazz unter den Sternen.
Bitte bringen Sie was auch immer Sie bequem fuhlen müssen- ein Stuhl, Decke, Speise usw.
Wir werden uns halbeswegs zwischen die Bühne and das Kapitol treffen.
We will be partway up he hill towards the Capitol building, to the left of the stage. Look for the German flag. And I will probably bring a canopy for shade.
This series features internationally-known musicians and is the longest-running free outdoor jazz festival in the USA! Please try to join us, even if it's hot! Last week, an estimated 2,000 people attended when it was 95 degrees, so the music must be worth it!
item.how_to_find_us: Looking at the stage, pretend that's the 12:00 position. We will be at 9:00 position.
item.name: Cool jazz and German picnic!
